name: Event Signage Copy
description: Craft clear and captivating text for your event signage in just a few minutes.

nodes.name: llm
nodes.title: Answers
nodes.description: Answer a question using a large language model. Chat history can be used to maintain context between messages.

input_config.human_message: Write copy for a poster for a [event name] {{event_name}} event which includes [event details, such as time, location, etc. {{date_time}} {{location}} based on insight information such as (Signage Type, Target Audience, Key Message, Desired Tone) {{type}} {{target_audience}} {{key_message}} {{tone}} . Include a call-to-action.

tone.title: Desired Tone (Optional)
tone.description: Specify the desired tone for the signage (e.g., professional, informative, fun, engaging).

type.title: Signage Type (Optional)
type.description: If there are different signage types (e.g., welcome sign, directional sign, session title sign), you can specify them here.

location.title: Event Location
location.description: Where will the event be held?

date_time.title: Event Date & Time
date_time.description: The date and time your event will take place.

ui_metadata.value: Friday, August 9th, 2024, from 9:00 AM to 5:00 PM

key_message.title: Key Message
key_message.description: Briefly describe the main message you want the signage to convey.

ui_metadata.value: Level Up Your Social Media Game! Learn cutting-edge marketing strategies from industry experts.

target_audience.title: Target Audience (Optional)
target_audience.description: Knowing your target audience can help tailor the signage copy for better impact.
